metadata.title: Nano Banana 2 Showcase - Nano Banana 2 AI Image Editor
metadata.description: Explore amazing AI-generated artworks and creative designs powered by advanced image generation and editing technology

showcase.name: showcase
showcase.title: Nano Banana 2 Showcase
showcase.description: Explore various types of image processing effects and experience the power of professional AI technology.
showcase.subtitle: Unleash your creativity and explore more ways to play, not just the cases below.

items.title: Background Replacement
items.description: Separate the subject from the original background and replace it with a new, more creative scene.

effects.name: Vintage Tool Desk
effects.prompt: Change background to a vast grassland
effects.description: Place subject in a craftsman's workshop setting

effects.name: Tropical Beach
effects.prompt: Change background to a winding mountain road
effects.description: Sunny beach background with crystal clear water

effects.name: Modern Office
effects.prompt: Change the background to a retro tool workbench.

items.title: Lighting Adjustment
items.description: Adjust lighting effects with AI to change the mood and give your pictures a cinematic feel.

effects.name: Dramatic Shadows
effects.prompt: Adjust to the cool tones of the 'blue hour'

effects.name: Soft Glow
effects.prompt: Switch to a night scene with point light sources

items.title: Style Conversion
items.description: Transform your photos into different artistic styles with AI.

effects.name: Watercolor
effects.prompt: Convert to a rich oil painting style

effects.name: Anime Style
effects.prompt: Convert to a retro pixel art style

items.title: Color Change
items.description: Professional color grading to completely change the mood of your photos.

effects.name: Vibrant Colors
effects.prompt: Change all green leaves to red

effects.name: Moody Tones
effects.prompt: Change all green leaves to yellow

effects.name: Vintage Film
effects.prompt: Change all green leaves to blue

items.title: Age Transformation
items.description: See yourself at different ages with advanced AI technology.
